price: bilang usaping mula sa ganang Amin. Tunay na Kami noon ay nagsusugo,
arabic: أَمۡرٗا مِّنۡ عِندِنَآۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا مُرۡسِلِينَ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: amran min ʿindinā innā kunnā mur'silīna
